generated_body: In reading "The NFL Hot Seat: Sean McVay ran out of magic, and Jared Goff isn't helping," the user may expect an analysis of the current challenges facing the Los Angeles Rams, particularly focusing on head coach Sean McVay and quarterback Jared Goff.
